notes: 17 year old boy with vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills and loss of appetite for the past 3 days. Lab results show hemoglobin: 9.7 g/dL, platelet: 110,000 /cu.mm, creatinine: 3.6 mg/dL, BUN: 73 mg/dL, direct bilirubin: 2.4 mg/dL, LDH: 881 IU/L and schistocytes and helmet cells on peripheral blood smear.
